subject: Basketball
Television
lead_paragraph: The decisive game of the N.B.A. finals on Sunday generated an average of 23.5 million viewers on ABC, up 31 percent from the 17.9 million who watched the comparable game last year.
snippet: The decisive game of the N.B.A. finals on Sunday generated an average of 23.5 million viewers on ABC, up 31 percent from the 17.9 million who watched the comparable game last year.
